=== Lubuntu specific packages ===
This package documented the specific packages of Lubuntu.
Current list :
* <nowiki>[[ https:--code.launchpad.net-~lubuntu-desktop-+junk-lubuntu-default-settings | lubuntu-default-settings]]</nowiki> : Default settings for Lubuntu session.
* <nowiki>[[ https:--code.launchpad.net-~lubuntu-desktop-+junk-lubuntu-artwork | lubuntu-artwork]]</nowiki> : Default artwork for Lubuntu session
* <nowiki>[[ https:--code.launchpad.net-~lubuntu-desktop-+junk-lubuntu-meta | lubuntu-meta]]</nowiki> : The meta-package which provide lubuntu-desktop.

==== How to manage those packages ====
* Install bzr-builddeb and devscripts
* When you do a modification, add an entry in debian/changelog and run "debcommit" to commit change.
* To test the package, use bzr-buildpackage. It will generate the deb in ../build-area/
* To generate the source for upload, use bzr-buildpackage -S
* When you want to release, use "dch -r" and "debcommit -r"
